sentences.english: A hot beanbag may be just the cure you need.
sentences.chinese: 一个热的装着豆类的布袋正好能满足你的需要。

sentences.english: LegumsLegumes put nitrogen back into the soil.
sentences.chinese: 但豆类植物却为土壤制造氮肥。

sentences.english: A method was developed for determination of fipronil residue in leguminous vegetables with solid-phase extraction(SPE) combined with gas chromatography.
sentences.chinese: 建立氟虫腈在豆类蔬菜中的残留气相色谱分析方法。

sentences.english: Eat more beans. Beans of all kinds are nutritional powerhouses.
sentences.chinese: 食用更多豆类，各种豆类是养分供应站。

sentences.english: Eat more beans. Beans of all kinds are nutritional powerhouses.
sentences.chinese: 食用更多豆类，各种豆类是养分供应站。

sentences.english: The people cultivate mainly rice and beans.
sentences.chinese: 这里的人们主要种植稻子和豆类。

sentences.english: Like the MM let beans are usually now your food list.
sentences.chinese: 喜欢美的MM无妨让豆类常呈现在你的食物清单上。

sentences.english: The lean man leans on the clean bean plant to read a leafleaflet.
sentences.chinese: 瘦人斜靠在干净的豆类植物上读叶片传单。

sentences.english: Consumption of legumes and beans as major sources of protein is on the rise.
sentences.chinese: 作为蛋白质的主要来源的豆类消费越来越多。

sentences.english: Cup for cup, beans have more fiber than whole grains.
sentences.chinese: 相比而言，豆类比谷物含有更多的纤维。

sentences.english: I also provided bean soup which contained two types of beans- red kidney beans and vegetarian baked beans.
sentences.chinese: 我还准备了含有红芸豆和蔬菜烘豆这两种豆类的汤。

sentences.english: So he started cooking and eating whole grains, beans and vegetables.
sentences.chinese: 于是，他开始做并吃全麸谷物，豆类和蔬菜。

sentences.english: One striking example of shrinking diversity is Latin America's beans.
sentences.chinese: 多样性减少的一个惊人例子就是拉丁美洲的豆类。

sentences.english: Such as beans, glial type of food such as pork skin, improve skin elasticity.
sentences.chinese: 如豆类，胶质类像肉皮这样的食品，提高皮肤弹性。

sentences.english: We never think of this legume unless it's in our soup.
sentences.chinese: 我们从想不到这种豆类，除非它们放在汤里。

definition: grain crops other than rice and wheat
